name: Can I Be An Adventurer Too?
name_original: Can I Be An Adventurer Too?
description:
Overview

"Anyone can be an adventurer"

As long as you can pass the certification test that is. The only thing that sets you apart from most other applicants is that... You are blind. But that won't stop you from trying to become an adventurer!

Controls

Arrow Keys to Navigate the Map and Menus

Enter to Confirm Selection in Menus

Space to Hear Description of Selection you are Hovering in Menus

Mechanics

Use the sound cues of the game to navigate around the map, defeat enemy and solve a puzzle. Clear the final boss to become a certified adventurer.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

Project Can I Be An Adventurer Too? was developed over the span of 5 weeks as part of my "Game Audio" Module

NOTE

Imagery shown in screenshots are to help visualize the game. Actual gameplay has no graphics
